group_1.narration: I'm older now...@I have survived this long as a Magical Girl.
And yet...@It took me way too long to@learn the truth about Witches.
I despise Kyubey with all of my heart.@It hurts so much not to have realized.
And there's one more concern that I have.
I think there may be a chance...@That my wish killed those other girls.
It's my fault she became a Witch.@It all happened so I could live.@Her death may be how my wish@to survive was granted.@That thought terrifies me.
I think I should avoid@getting involved with others.
You're the only one...@You're more than a teammate to me.@You're the one person I can call a partner.@I want to stay with you until the very end.
These are my true feelings.@Forgive me for being so weak.

group_1.textCenter: It's all right. It's going to be all right,@Yachan.
You don't need to suffer because of your@wish anymore.
(I need to bring about liberation for all of@us so I can go back to being a normal girl.)
(I need to do it for all the people I've@dragged in along the way, too.)
(But I know...despite all that, you still@won't forgive me, will you, Yachan?)
(You can sleep inside the [textBlue:Rumor] until@everything is done...)

group_1.textRight: Time to tell the tale of the [textBlue:Rumor].

group_1.narration: Have you heard? Has anyone told you?@The Rumor of the SÃ©ance Shrine.
A family member? A lover? A stranger?@If you're eager to see someone,@leave it to the god of Mizuna Shrine!
Write their name on a blessed wooden plaque,@visit the Shrine, and offer a proper prayer.@The god will bring them to you.
But beware! Beware!@They say you'll get lost in bliss and@never be able to return home.

group_1.textCenter: (Please have a pleasant dream with that@illusion of me.)
(Then, when it's time for you to wake up...)
(You'll be free from the anguish of the wish@you made.)

group_1.textRight: What a hurtful question to ask...

group_1.textCenter: Once all this is over...we'll both be free.
